title: Worlds pick/bans help!
body:
Im not usually a follower of the pros, but this year i am quite enjoying watching worlds. But unfortunately i probably wont be able to catch any of the games today.
But i would like to know if Aurelion Sol, Taliyah or Azir are picked or banned, and by whom.

So if someone would be kind enough to update me on here, on if those champs are picked and by whom. that would be great ^^

thanks :)

{{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:163}}

replies.body:
Aurelion was picked day 1 by RNG against TSM but the game was remade and Aurelion disabled due to a visual bug. NOt sure if he is fixed, and even if he was people might not want to bother picking him in case they have to remake due to the bug.

He has been banned twice. Once by Samsung against Splyce and once by G2 against CLG.

Azir and Taliyah are no shows right now. Its mainly Syndra/Cass/Ori mids.

People like stats. Some friendly people have given you all you want here. Nidalee 100% pick or ban so far.

http://lol.gamepedia.com/2016_World_Championship/Champion_Statistics

EDIT: CLG just picked Aurelion vs ROX.
FW picked Aurelion vs SKT.
Azir was banned in the EDG vs H2K game actually, i think that was on day four if i can remember correctly

Aurelion sol has been getting disabled a bit due to some bugs with his W being misrepresented on the map. IE his lil circles will be somewhere in the fog of war, but aurelion will be chillin mid lane. I do believe this is fixed now

As for taliyah and azir, i have no idea. personally im just like you. Ill watch an odd game here and there maybe, but I dont really follow on until grand finals hehe.
